This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-alerts/CodeSystem/notification-event defines the following codes:

LvlCodeDisplayDefinition
1prescription-refill-request Prescription Refill RequestThe purpose or content of the notification is a prescription refill request.
1progress-update Progress UpdateThe purpose or content of the notification is a progress update.
1report-labs Report LabsThe purpose or content of the notification is to report labs.
1appointment-reminder Appointment ReminderThe purpose or content of the notification is an appointment reminder.
1phone-consult Phone ConsultThe purpose or content of the notification is a phone consult.
1summary-report Summary ReportThe purpose or content of the notification is a summary report.
1notification NotificationThe purpose or content a notification about an event. Usage Note: This is a high level code and should not be used in the value set - it is a grouper code for notifications of any kind.
2  notification-admit Notification AdmitThe purpose or content a notification about an admission. Usage Note: The included child codes correspond to the Encounter.class codes drawn from v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActEncounterCode.
3    notification-admit-er Notification Admit ERThe purpose or content a notification about an admission to the Emergency department Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.class code 'EMER'.
3    notification-admit-inpatient Notification Admit InpatientThe purpose or content a notification about an admission to a hosptial or equivalent facility. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.class code 'IMP'.
3    notification-admit-forobservation Notification Admit for ObservationThe purpose or content a notification about an admission for observation, because they require a significant period of treatment and monitoring to determine whether or not their condition warrants an inpatient admission or discharge. In the majority of cases the decision about admission or discharge will occur within a time period determined by local, regional or national regulation, often between 24 and 48 hours. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.class code 'OBSENC'.
3    notification-admit-ambulatory Notification Admit AmbulatoryThe purpose or content a notification about an admission to a healthcare facility (e.g. a practitioner, aTMs office, clinic setting, or hospital) on a nonresident basis. The term ambulatory usually implies that the patient has come to the location and is not assigned to a bed. Sometimes referred to as an outpatient encounter. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.class code 'AMB'.
3    notification-pre-admit Notification Pre-admitThe purpose or content a notification about upcoming services at a healtcare facility. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.class code 'PRENC'.
3    notification-admit-short-stay Notification Admit Short StayThe purpose or content a notification about an admission to to a health care facility for a predetermined length of time, usually less than 24 hours. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the Encounter.class code 'SS'.
2  notification-discharge Notification DischargeThe purpose or content a notification about a discharge. Usage Note: The included child codes correspond to the encounter.hospitalization.dischargeDisposition codes drawn from FHIR code system discharge-disposition.
3    notification-discharge-home Notification Discharge HomeThe purpose or content a notification about an admission to to a health care facility for a predetermined length of time, usually less than 24 hours. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the encounter.hospitalization.dischargeDisposition code 'home'.
3    notification-discharge-skilled-nursing Notification Discharge Skilled NursingThe purpose or content a notification about a discharge to the patient's home environment. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the encounter.hospitalization.dischargeDisposition code 'snf'.
3    notification-discharge-longterm-care Notification Discharge Longterm CareThe purpose or content a notification about a discharge to a long-term care facility. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the encounter.hospitalization.dischargeDisposition code 'long'.
3    notification-discharge-desceased Notification Discharge DesceasedThe purpose or content a notification that the patiened died during the encounter. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the encounter.hospitalization.dischargeDisposition code 'exp'.
3    notification-discharge-rehab Notification Discharge RehabThe purpose or content a notification about a discharge to a post-acute care rehabilitation facility. Usage Note: This child code corresponds to the encounter.hospitalization.dischargeDisposition code 'rehab'.
2  notification-referral Notification ReferralThe purpose or content a notification about a referral for consultation.
2  notification-treatment-change Notification Treatment ChangeThe purpose or content a notification about a change in treatment - either the start or the end.
2  notification-lab-report Notification Lab ReportThe purpose or content a notification about lab results being available.
2  notification-treatment-issue Notification Treatment IssueThe purpose or content a notification about a problem that is applicable to a treatment the patient is receiving such as drug or device recall or reported issue.
2  notification-ordered-device Notification Ordered DeviceThe purpose or content a notification about a Device having been ordered for the patient.
2  notification-prior-auth-notice Notification Prior Authorization NoticeThe purpose or content a notification about a change to the Prior Authorization (Pended to Approved/Denied).
2  notification-new-condition Notification New ConditionThe purpose or content a notification about a new diagnosis / condition.
2  notification-care-team-change Notification Care Team ChangeThe purpose or content a notification about changes occurring in the care team.
2  notification-coverage-change Notification Coverage ChangeThe purpose or content a notification about changes in insurance coverage, either the start or the end.
2  notification-social-determinants-change Notification Social Determinants ChangeThe purpose or content a notification about change in the social circumstances of the patient (Social Determinants of Health).
2  notification-public-health Notification Public HealthThe purpose or content a notification about a Public Health event.
2  notification-outpatient-visit Notification Outpatient VisitThe purpose or content a notification about the start of an outpatient encounter.
2  notification-vital-statistics Notification Vital StatisticsThe purpose or content a notification about either the birth or death of the patient.
2  notification-pharmacy Notification PharmacyThe purpose or content a notification about a change in prescription status for a medication at the pharmacy (Pickup, Restock, Dispense).
2  notification-workers-comp Notification Workers CompThe purpose or content a notification about healthcare services that are rendered under Workman's Compensation rules.
